definitions.title: gent.
definitions.body: [[מַָשׁ]] Ge 10:23, as son of Aram, Sam. [[משא]]; LXX Mosox; so rd. in ‖ 1Ch 1:17 for MT [[מֶָשֶׁח]] A LXXL Mosox; v. Kau Kit..Loc. dub. Bo Mich Mons Mas-ius, N. of Nisibis (between Armen. and Mesop.), but name not certainly old Aram. (unknown in As.) cf. Di:ad loc. As. Masû (Syro–Ar. desert Dl:Par 242f.) is hardly poss., cf. [[מֵשָׁא]].
